title: Why Is It Important to Maintain a Healthy Lifestyle?
excerpt: What does a healthy lifestyle mean to you? What steps are you taking to improve your health? Is it something you prioritize every day, or is it a goal you’ve postponed for the future—perhaps once you’re older?

title: The Best Meal Plan Is the One That’s Personalized for You
excerpt: The best diet you can follow is the one that suits you. Every person is different, and that’s why nutrition should never be one-size-fits-all—it must be personalized
